cancelEscrow(uint256).details: Only buyer can cancel. Escrow must be in Created state (not yet funded).

params.milestoneAmounts: Array of amounts for each milestone

returns._0: hasCondition True if a condition hash is set

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

releaseMilestone(uint256,uint256).details: Fee is calculated proportionally based on the escrow's stored fee

releaseWithCondition(uint256,bytes).details: Allows release by providing condition data that hashes to stored conditionHash

params.conditionData: The condition data that should hash to conditionHash

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns.valid: True if condition matches or no condition was set

escrows(uint256).notice: Mapping of escrow ID to Escrow

hasReleaseCondition(uint256).notice: Check if an escrow has a release condition set

milestones(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping of escrow ID to milestones

refund(uint256).notice: Refund buyer (before seller confirms or if deadline passed)

verifyCondition(uint256,bytes).notice: Verify if condition data matches the stored condition hash
